subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Irving H. Picard, the trustee seeking money for the victims of Bernard L. Madoff’s fraud, said it would have been difficult to recover any more than $162 million from the owners of the Mets.
snippet: Irving H. Picard, the trustee seeking money for the victims of Bernard L. Madoff’s fraud, said it would have been difficult to recover any more than $162 million from the owners of the Mets.
